title: cmd/ld: add a flag to set a string value by reading from a file
body:
The -X linker flag lets you set the value of a string to a string provided on the
command line.

I'd like to add a similar flag (-x? -Y?) that sets the value of a string to the contents
of a file provided on the command line.

This would provide an efficient, easy way to bundle data into a Go binary, without
resorting to the techniques discussed at
https://code.google.com/p/go-wiki/wiki/GcToolchainTricks#Bundle_data_into_Go_binary.
